class.name: PageContent
class.author: Christopher Swenson
class.description: This class should be created once per page and manages all on screen elements
class.property: The scale the content should be rendered as. The same as course.scale
Allows for the preloading of files

method.name: addTextObject
method.description: Adds a text object to the page
method.param: The id of the object, will become the div id.
The X or left position of the object
The Y or top position of the object
uiStyle to be passed to the object
The text to display.

method.name: addImageObject
method.description: Adds an image object to the page
method.param: The id of the object, will become the div id.
The X or left position of the object
The Y or top position of the object
The width of the object
The height of the object
uiStyle to be passed to the object
The file path to the image.

method.name: addTimer
method.description: Adds a timer object to the page
method.param: The id of the object.
How long to wait between onTick events
How many times to repeat the onTickEvent

method.name: addAudio
method.description: Adds an audio object to the page
method.param: The id of the object.
The file path of the audio file (.mp3)
Should the audio being playing as soon as it's loaded?

method.name: addAudioButton
method.description: Adds an audio button to the page
method.param: The audio object to attach the button to.
The id of the button object.
The css style to attach to the button
a POJO giving the x and y location of the button
The parent of the audio button

method.name: stopAllAudio
method.description: Stops all playing audio except the optional ignoreAudioObject
method.param: An audio object to ignore when stopping

method.name: addButton
method.description: Adds a button to the page
method.param: The id of the button object.
The left position of the object.
The top position of the object.
The text to display on the button
Additional parameters to pass to the button

method.name: addChild
method.description: Adds a component to the page
method.param: The object (inherited from UIComponentBase) to add to the page
Should the object be scaled to match the course scale?

method.name: reparentDiv
method.description: Moves a div to another div as a child
method.param: The div to reparent
The new parent div

method.name: refreshStage
method.description: Repaints the course with the given scale
method.param: The scale the course should be set to

method.name: addPreloadFile
method.description: Adds a file to the list of files to be preloaded
method.param: The file to preload

method.name: preloadFiles
method.param: An array of files to preload, or the list of files created with the addPreloadFile()

method.name: destroy
method.description: Cleanly destroys the PageContent Object and all children.
